mapper.insert: insert into dz_marketType( id, marketName, comments, addTime, status ) values( #{id}, #{marketName}, #{comments}, #{addTime}, #{status} )
mapper.update: update dz_marketType set status = #{status} where id in (${ids})
update dz_marketType set status = '-1' where id in (${ids})
mapper.select: select id,marketName,comments,addTime,status from dz_marketType where status != '-1' order by id asc
select id,marketName,comments,addTime,status from dz_marketType order by ${orderby} limit #{start_num,,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{page_size,,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id,marketName,comments,addTime,status from dz_marketType where id=#{id}
